column3:
"signals replaceability" doesn't really seem useful terminology for users. Maybe "Allow increasing fee later" or something would make more sense.

IMO there should be some way for the user to actually control what the fee is bumped to.

Unfortunately this missed the 0.13 feature merge window. We should merge it soon after 0.13 is branched off.\n(even if not perfect, even if some texts could still be improved, this is a strict improvement)\n
is anyone working on rebasing this or shall I?\n
I'm currently not working on this and I have no near future plans to work on this.\nWe should first review and merge https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/8456.\n
Closing. We need RPC support first.
